1336880.name: Kebab Simulator
1336880.description:
Hey you. Yeah you. Are you tired of having to take yourself out of a sofa and actually do something in order to cook kebab?
Want to cook kebab but too lazy or can't exit home due to quarantine?
Worry no more. Here comes an immersive experience that will help.

Features:

-First person view

-Cook kebab. Watch it closely so that it won't burn.

-Enjoy your treat: eat kebab in first person perspective

-Unique Immersive experience

-Beautiful graphics

-Great soundtrack

-Achievements
1336880.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语, 简体中文
